```{r setup}
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
```



Data

```{r}

library(readr)
adae <- read_csv("https://rhoinc.github.io/data-library/data/clinical-trials/adam/adae.csv")

adae

```

data viz

```{r}
ggplot(adae) +
  aes(x = AESEV, fill = SEX, weight = AGE) +
  geom_bar() +
  scale_fill_hue(direction = 1) +
  theme_minimal()
```

plotly

```{r}
p <- ggplot(adae) +
  aes(x = AESEV, fill = SEX, weight = AGE) +
  geom_bar() +
  scale_fill_hue(direction = 1) +
  theme_minimal()

ggplotly(p)
```
